md:
giải nghĩa từ "breakup" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Breakup (noun) - sự chia tay, sự tan vỡ

Meaning: The act of breaking or separating into parts; a separation or division.

Example sentence: The breakup of the company led to many job losses.

* Breakup (verb) - chia tay, tan vỡ

Meaning: To separate or divide into parts; to end a romantic relationship.

Example sentence: They broke up after five years of dating.

Related words: separation, division, split, divorce, parting

Synonyms: separation, division, split, dissolution, disbandment

Note: The verb "breakup" can also be used in the context of a group or organization, meaning to disband or dissolve. For example: "The band broke up after their last concert."
